captions.text: TUERCK: "What's up guys? We are here at Raceway Park in Englishtown New Jersey for a Game of Drift II I brought out my drift alliance brother in 2010, former drift Champion, Vaughn Gittin Jr. We took a lot of your suggestions from a Game of Drift to implement into the challenges were going to be doing this time as well as built upon a lot of the oldchallenges we did in the first Game of Drift."
STUNT - "Ahhh"
TUERCK: "Let's hope I don't get my ass kicked right off the bat."
GITTIN: "I'm gonna do everything I can to make sure you do get your ass kicked."
TUERCK: "Of course! I just wanna win at my own goddamn game for once. For once!

BARREL TAP CHALLENGE/ TUERCK: " For this challenge, for the Game of Drift, there's gonna be a barrel tap. Just like last year you wanna tap the barrel and whoever moves it the least amount in the circle wins. If you move it outside the circle it's an automatic letter.
TUERCK'S TURN AT STUNT - GITTIN: "Alright Tuerck!...Woooaaahhhh....Nice."
GITTIN'S TURN AT STUNT - TUERCK: "I got it!! I won!!...Yes! Hahaha"
GITTIN: "Ahhh! Damnit!!"/TUERCK : "Hahaha"
TUERCK: "Only by inches, bro."
GITTIN: "It's cause my car's stronger. Yours just folded and mine is a beast"

TUERCK: "Alright next challenge is drift limbo and basically were gonna drift through here while maintaining your angle and not touch these two barrels. The barrels are currently set at 220 inches. Your car I believe is about 176 inches and mine's at about 174 inches. Is that really too big of an advantage to warrant a handicap? If we both make it through we'll be moving the barrels in in 12 inch increments until somebody screws up and gets a letter."
TWO BARRELS STUNT - Gittin hits a barrel - GITTEN "How close? I must've just touched it. Cause I didn't feel it at all."
TUERCK: "You punted it pretty good. You definitely caught a good inch of the thing."
GITTIN: "Alright."
TUERCK: "So that's an R."
GITTIN: "Damnit!"
TUERCK: "That's an R"

TUERCK: "Alright, challenge number three is double dare drift. This is one of my favorites from the last game of drift. You have to hold this container of cold water in your hand and the least amount spilt wins at the end. Here is the kicker though. On this year's game of drift we have to swap the container from hand to hand in between these two big barrels."
GITTIN: "Alright."
DOUBLE DARE STUNT - *LAUGHING AND SWEARING*
TUERCK: "That did not go so well guys." *looking at containers of water* "Tuerck again!"
GITTIN: "A millimeter! Ahh!...I want it remeasured."

TUERCK: "Alright, challenge number four is blindfold drift. I've got these electric goggles on my face that are spray painted and I can't see an effing thing *runs into back of car* I just wanna thank all of you fans that commented under the call log video for totally screwing us over and making us do the worst challenge in the whole Game of Drift video series. This is definitely gonna be the demise of Ryan Tuerck. Chris Forsberg is gonna be our navigator and ahhh hopefully this works I guess. So, let's see what happens."
GITTIN: "Hopefully we dont lose three drivers here."
FORSBERG: "Yeah, or just two. Two at a time."
STUNT - TUERCK "Alright." GITTIN: "I love you all....Did we do it?" FORSBERG: "We stopped right there." GITTIN: "YEAHHH."
GITTIN: "Yeahhhh. You got a D!" *Highfives Tony Angelo*

TUERCK: "Alright this challenge is called Gallager Drift to pay homage to the now weilding maniac Gallager. And uh we have some Louisville Sluggers that are strapped to the sides of our cars and basically we're just gonna try to smash these watermelons that are set up in these barrels. It only counts if you hit the watermelon with the bat. If you hit it with the side of your car, or if you hit the barrel itself, doesnt count. The person that hits the most watermelons with the bat wins."
WATERMELON STUNT - TUERCK "Alright. One, two standing. That's not bad."
TUERCK: "I mean you hit almost all of them. We got a lot of body here it looks like."
TUERCK: "Alright so we reviewed the tapes, we both got two, and its a goddamn tie. So the tie breaker is: two more watermelons, whoever hits them the best, wins."
TIE BREAKER - GITTIN: "Turn now, turn...and he hit it with the car." TUERCK: "He got one."
TUERCK: "So yeah, we settled our tie breaker and uh I got a letter. So nice job."
TUERCK: "Alright so this paint drift. We got these rollers on the back of our cars on a spring and whoever can paint the longest line on this wall is the winnerrr!"
GITTIN: "It'll be me!!"
PAINT DRIFT PRANK - TUERCK: "That's pretty solid" *measures the line made by Gittin* "146 - even." GITTIN: "Hey he missed it! He missed!! D-R-I!! Tied up!"
TUERCK: "You all know how dumb driving while texting is but we're gonna be texting while drifting. Here in Englishtown on a closed course. So its the safest possible. So ahh what's the turn gonna be?
GITTIN: "We're gonna have to text each other, driving while texting is dumb and dangerous. We have to send it to each of the other's phone by the end of the hairpin. Most complete wins."
TUERCK: "Okay."
TEXTING STUNT - GITTIN: "Texting, w-h -" TUERCK: "All I got was driving."
TUERCK: "One word, plus two letters."
GITTIN: "I just got one word."
TUERCK: "One word so I end up being the winner. I would not recommend this to anyone..that was..." *high fives Gittin* "Good job I guess."

TUERCK: "Alright this challenge, just like last year, it's called flip a bitch. We're basically just gonna be trying to slide our cars into this area in between these two barrels without touching them or moving them outside the six inch gap we gave around the edges. You want to come as close as possible to this slide ride with your door handle. We'll measure door handle to the guard rail and closest to the guard rail wins.
FLIP A BITCH STUNT - GITTIN: "17 inches" TUERCK: "Yep, 17 even" GRIFFIN: "Jesus"
FLIP A BITCH STUNT - TUERCK: "Gittin wins."

TUERCK: "This is what it comes down to. We're all tied up now with D-R-I-F for both of us. It's been a fierce battle soto go out with a bang we set up a super G drift challenge is what we're gonna call this and its basically a slalom course of barrels that we have to drift through the middle of. You cannot touch the barrels while you're going through the slalom. If you touch the barrel it doesnt count. Basically the person who drifts through the most amount of these barrels is the winner
SUPER G STUNT - TUERCK: "Damn!"
TUERCK: "I ended up taking it by one. I straightened up at the end with the rules of the game you have to be sideways through every single bay even if you go straight through the barrels."
GITTIN: "And I was straight through the barrel and uh, you're the winner!"
TUERCK: "I won my own game! That's crazy!"

title: Game Of DRIFT II feat. Ryan Tuerck & Vaughn Gittin Jr: Tuerck'd
